column4: Hi! I've installed apache2, php5 and mysql-server, now where can I place my .php files?
And how can I delete files in it? 'Move to Trash' is grayed out, probably because it needs root rights.
thanks, couldn't find the command -- it's "del" or "delete" on Windows
what you mean, are you want to del /var/www ?
No, I wanted to delete index.html in it. Now, how do I save files in it? Do I need to run 'sudo gedit' every time? :/
you can used gui for edit index.html on you /var/www/index.html
and gui is open you can edti index.html with bluefish
thx, btw I'm using gedit not bluefish
and coder2 am sorry i don't understand
I have Apache installed, and I can't access /var/www. So I added myself to the www-data user group, but I still can't access /var/www.
